snippet: Harvey Weinstein succeeded in getting the rating changed for the documentary “Bully,” but he stands accused of making a fuss purely for publicity, which he denies.
abstract: Harvey Weinstein succeeded in getting the ratings changed from an R to a PG-13 label for his documentary Bully, but he stands accused of making a fuss purely for publicity, a charge that he denies.
lead_paragraph: Harvey Weinstein succeeded in getting the rating changed for the documentary “Bully,” but he stands accused of making a fuss purely for publicity, which he denies.

headline.seo: Tension Lingers Over Harvey Weinstein Win on ‘Bully’ Rating
headline.main: The Dust Kicked Up by ‘Bully’ Still Flies
headline.print_headline: The Dust Kicked Up By ‘Bully’ Still Flies
